meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny! Welcome to my groovy review of Chants of Sennaar, the most tubular puzzle game that's got everyone chanting its name!

As I dove into this linguistic adventure, I couldn't help but notice all the fancy words and phrases used by our esteemed critics. Slant Magazine called it "an interesting and impressive game" - yeah, because who doesn't love a good anthropology lesson in disguise? Worth Playing thought it was "fascinating puzzle adventure game" with some "brain teasers"... yawn.

But seriously, I'm here to give you the lowdown on this enigmatic game that's got everyone buzzing. So, let's get to it!

Chants of Sennaar is all about connecting ancient populations through the power of words. Sounds like a bunch of mumbo-jumbo? Think again! This game has some serious mojo - its translation aspect adds an extra layer of challenge and makes you feel like a genius (or at least, that's what I told myself).

The stealth elements are where it's at, folks! Solid mechanics, quick restarts, and generous checkpoint systems make for a thrilling experience. And let's not forget the presentation - alluring, if I do say so myself.

Now, I know some of you might be thinking, "But Hippo Penny, what about the puzzles?" Ah, my friends, this is where Chants of Sennaar shines! Intricate and perfectly-challenging, these brain teasers will keep you scratching your head (or in my case, flapping my ears). And when you finally validate that last glyph... well, it's like winning a game of linguistic bingo!

So, what did all those fancy critics think? Well, let's just say they were all chanting the same tune: Chants of Sennaar is a unique and fascinating puzzle game! Worth Playing gave it an 80, SpazioGames and God is a Geek also chimed in with their own 80s. Slant Magazine was less impressed, but hey, someone's gotta be the buzzkill, right?

In conclusion, Chants of Sennaar is a must-play for anyone looking to spice up their gaming routine. It's like discovering a hidden treasure chest filled with linguistic goodies! (Sorry, had to).

There you have it, folks - my groovy review of Chants of Sennaar. If you're ready to get lost in this tubular puzzle game, then what are you waiting for? Go ahead and give it a try!

Stay hip, and happy gaming!
